scenario_text.value: Minoru! How’s it going? You have any luck?

’Fraid not. Everywhere we try to go is
covered in thick fog. We have to turn back.
It’s been a total waste of time.
I’m sorry to hear it.

Man, just what is wrong with this world?
What’s going on?

(Minoru sounds pretty upset. Not that I blame
him, dealing with all this horrible fog...)

(And he was so fired up earlier. I’d like to
find a way to encourage him if I can.)

(Minoru tends to be optimistic. Maybe if
I try to be positive, he’ll brighten up too.)

(Though maybe it’d be better for him to focus
on beating the Master to save this world.)

(Or I could try getting him to think of Aoi
instead of the fog.)
(How should I respond to Minoru?)
Laugh and be positive.
Focus on the Master.
Shift subjects to Aoi.
Laugh and be positive.

Ahaha! Come on, Minoru, don’t look so down.
I’m sure things will work out!
You...you think so?

You know, it’s not like you to be so
positive, Takuma.

Yes, that is unusual. That sounded more like
something Minoru would say.
That’s why I said it.

Minoru, you’re always smiling and laughing
when everyone else is feeling scared, right?

Well, I think that attitude of yours has
helped us out a lot.

So I thought I’d try out my own Minoru
impression.

Heh... Heheh... There’s just no beating you,
is there, Takuma?
Focus on the Master.

Hey, isn’t it just because we don’t know what
might happen to this world...
...that we need to stop the Master?
Yeah... Yeah, you’re right.

Sorry, I guess staring out into all that fog
made me lose my nerve.
Shift subjects to Aoi.

Hey Minoru, I know the fog’s a big deal, but
shouldn’t we be focusing on Aoi right now?

After all, if we don’t find her soon, we may
never make it to the next step.

You’re right. I mean, it’s hard not to think
about what’s going on with the fog, but...

...even if we can’t ignore it, Aoi is our top
priority right now.

Sorry, Takuma. I shouldn’t be getting ahead
of myself. I should focus on finding Aoi.
I’m going to look around a little more.

Even if we can’t just ignore the fog, Aoi is
our top priority right now.
